data.system_settings: MacBook Pro (13", Mid-2012), macOS v10.14.1 (Mojave) - iPhone 6s, iOS 12.1.1 Beta (16C5050a)
data.actual_result: You get removed from the server even if you have another session active.
data.expected_result: I should stay in the server because I still have a session open on my phone.
data.short_description: Temporary Membership removes you from a server even if you still have an active session on another client.
data.steps_to_repro: - Have two devices with Discord open on the same account. (In my case, an iPhone, and MacBook Pro) - On one device, join a server with an invite that had temporary membership enabled. - Ensure that you won't be assigned roles. (For the temporary membership to work) - On the other device, quit your Discord client.
